entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a gamekeeper at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He is mentioned as asking Harry, Ron, and Hermione about their holidays.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is one of the main characters in the story. She is mentioned as reminding Harry and Ron to go to the library before lunch.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is one of the main characters in the story. He is mentioned as being distracted by Professor Flitwick's wand.

entities.name: professor flitwick
entities.description: Professor Flitwick is a teacher at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He is mentioned as having golden bubbles coming out of his wand.

entities.name: nicolas flamel
entities.description: Nicolas Flamel is a historical figure who is being guarded by something. Harry, Ron, and Hermione are trying to find out more about him.

entities.name: library
entities.description: The library at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry where Harry, Ron, and Hermione go to research Nicolas Flamel.
